security: Releasing the names and aliases of individuals associated with a particular dossier could potentially compromise ongoing investigations or reveal sensitive personal information.
summary: This document is an index tracing record of aliases and cosubjects associated with the dossier of Edifanio Romero Delgado, providing identifying information and related names.
summary_one_paragraph: This document, dated 05/01/98, is an index tracing record (DA Form 2371) from INSCOM/CSF for Edifanio Romero Delgado (dossier number AB632604W). It lists aliases used by Romero Delgado, including Romero Epifanio, Delgado Epifanio, and Romero-Delgado Epifanio, along with his Social Security number, date of birth, and place of birth. Additionally, it identifies cosubjects associated with Romero Delgado, such as Jose Luis Fornell Jacinto, Manuel Artime, and Felix Pelaez, referencing the document pages where these names appear.
title: DA FORM 2371 - INDEX TRACING RECORD OF ALIASES AND COSUBJECTS
